Sign Up as a Student or Teacher
You can either sign up as a student or as a teacher, and you will be directed to the appropriate dashboard
When you sign up as a teacher, you will be presented with a dashboard where you can upload videos, notes, manage students, etc.
As a student, you can view lessons from subjects of your choice, save and edit notes, interact with other learners, etc
Students can request online private lessons from a specific teacher, either as individual or a group. Subject to approval.
